title: About
content:
Hi! My name is Soufiane,



I started coding 6 years ago, studied computer science, and got my bachelor’s degree in software engineering from Abdelmalek Essaadi University.

I’ve worked as a freelance software developer/engineer, providing full-stack solutions for cross platforms (desktop, web and mobile).

I'm a big Apple geek/fan (iOS, macOS), despite not being a fan of closed ecosystems, but Apple is a special case ..., I like reading, learning new stuff, building and making, [sometimes hacking] all sorts of softwares and electronics that I'm able to understand or think of, writing [mediocre] articles, and having [probably mediocre] discussions with interesting [hopefuly positive] people.
